function_call.name: get_risks
function_call.arguments: {"risks":[{"Description":"Limited attention to Article Level Metrics (ALMs) and their impact on scientific community.","Impact":"Incomplete evaluation of scientific importance and peer review comprehensiveness.","Mitigation":"Increase awareness and education on the significance of ALMs in evaluating research impact.","Technologies":"Data analytics and visualization tools to track and display ALM data.","People":"Researchers and academic institutions.","Owner":"Scientific organizations and academic institutions."},{"Description":"Inadequate utilization of online comments, social media discussions, and recommendations as ALMs.","Impact":"Incomplete assessment of research impact and community engagement.","Mitigation":"Promote the integration of social media and online discussions into ALMs evaluation process.","Technologies":"Text mining and sentiment analysis tools for social media and comment analysis.","People":"Researchers, journal editors, and scientific publishers.","Owner":"Scientific publishers and online platforms."},{"Description":"Overreliance on traditional citation-based metrics for journal evaluation.","Impact":"Neglect of diverse impact indicators and community engagement aspects of research.","Mitigation":"Encourage the incorporation of ALMs alongside traditional citation metrics for comprehensive evaluation.","Technologies":"Integration of ALM data into existing journal evaluation platforms.","People":"Research evaluators, funding organizations, and academic institutions.","Owner":"Journal publishers and research evaluation committees."}]}
